001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import java.net.URI;
005
006import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
007
008public interface IDocumentBasedNodeItem extends INodeItem {
009
010  @Override
011  default IModelNodeItem<?, ?> getParentContentNodeItem() {
012    // there is no parent
013    return null;
014  }
015
016  /**
017   * Get the URI associated with this document.
018   *
019   * @return the document's URI or {@code null} if unavailable
020   */
021  @Nullable
022  URI getDocumentUri();
023
024  @Override
025  default URI getBaseUri() {
026    return getDocumentUri();
027  }
028
029  @Override
030  default INodeItem getParentNodeItem() {
031    // there is no parent
032    return null;
033  }
034}
